# serializeAsArchiveAndFlush(url:)

**Instance Method**

Serializes a pipeline data set to an archive.

## Declaration

```swift
func serializeAsArchiveAndFlush(url: URL) throws
```

## Parameters

- **url**: The URL used to serialize the serializer data set as an archive to.
